name: Solas (itch)
description:
In this game, you take on two roles, and use both cooperatively in order to solve puzzles and progress.

Solas was created by a team of 5 students from the University of Arts London. 2 Game Design students (David McAlle and Myself), and 3 Animation students (Emily Smith, Mariana Leal, and Elena Ivanaj). The stunning visuals of the game were created by the game's Animators using physical paper cutouts!
